concept.title: About conference calls
concept.shortdesc: Use a to speak with more than two people in two different locations at the same time.

conbody.p: Use one of the following types of conference calls to speak with multiple people.

dlentry.dd: Three-way conference calling connects two other people to a call.
Multi-line conference calling connects you to more than two but fewer than eight other people on a call.
Dial-in conference calling uses a single conference call number to connect multiple people.
